name: The Quick & The Quarrelsome
description:
Known issue: Controller is not detected in webgl version. Download the Windows client for the best results!

You, Vance Gasoline,  have successfully pulled off the heist of a lifetime! You have the dummy vault, and you need to be a distraction for your partner Peter Runner, by causing as much mayhem as possible!

Controls (Gamepad)

  • Left stick - Steer
  • Right Trigger - Gas
  • Left Trigger- Brake/Reverse
  • Alt+F4 - Close game (windows download only)

Controls (Keyboard)

  • A/D - Steer
  • W - Gas
  • S - Brake/Reverse
  • Alt+F4 - Close game (windows download only)

Note:  Anything in color (aside from the ground and your car) can be destroyed vith the vault. Some of the more fragile items can also be destroyed by your car, but when in doubt, smash it with the vault!

Most of our team has done at least one jam before, but this is our first submission with a third dimension. Due to this inexperience with 3D, we weren't able to get as much done as we wanted but we are happy to have something submitted (a huge improvement over last year's GMTK jam!).

Credits

Jordan "boateye" Johnson - Designer

Marty "Uncut Quesadilla" Nivinski - Programmer

Alex "Zeac" Hurley - Artist
